turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello sir. Can you get me some coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello sir. Which Starbucks would you like me to get it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Sutphin Boulevard in Jamaica, Queens. The address is 8900 Sutphin Boulevard Jamaica, NY 11435

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great. What coffee would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am looking at the menu and the iced coffee looks great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a medium?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No. The sizes (from smallest to largest) are listed as Tall, Grande, Venti Iced and Trenta Iced

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get a Grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great. Do you want to put anything in the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are my choices?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can decide which kinds of milk, sweetener, or spices

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great. I would like 2% milk and no sugar, liquid or from a packet

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that. Have you had iced coffee with cinnamon? I always enjoy it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That does sound good. Put a couple shakes of cinnamon in that iced coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. Is there anything else you want in the coffee? Honey? whipped cream? Real sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I am trying to avoid all forms of sugar in my diet and liquid sugar has snuck up on me in the past.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I understand. Way to stay healthy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Go ahead and place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir. Taken care of. The receipt will be sent as a text message to your phone. I will bring it to you soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you sir. See you soon
